items.sentence: I didn\'t know that Tom was Mary\'s grandson.
Tom said he couldn\'t give us what we wanted.
I skipped out on my appointment with my boss.
I think that that book is not so interesting.
I think that what you need now is some sleep.
I assume you know how to get to Tom\'s house.
I can play chess, but I can\'t play checkers.
I can\'t believe Tom really plans to do that.
Let\'s get out of here before it\'s too late.
Isn\'t there something you want to say to me?
What did you do with all the money you stole?
What does the doctor think is wrong with Tom?
This is the first time I\'ve heard that word.
This is the third time I\'ve seen this movie.
This is where Tom stays when he\'s in Boston.
I wonder whether or not Tom has quit his job.
I wonder whether or not Tom really said that.
I wonder whether or not Tom will like Boston.
I wonder why Tom told me I needed to do that.
I wonder why tennis is played in mini-skirts.
